```
from fastapi import FastAPI
from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware
from services import api_router

app = FastAPI(title="Project Backend", version="1.0.0")

# CORS configuration for frontend
app.add_middleware(
    CORSMiddleware,
    allow_origins=["*"],
    allow_credentials=True,
    allow_methods=["*"],
    allow_headers=["*"],
)

# Include the main router
app.include_router(api_router)

@app.get("/")
def read_root():
    return {"status": "Backend running"}

@app.get("/health")
def health_check():
    return {"status": "healthy"}

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import uvicorn
    uvicorn.run(app, host="0.0.0.0", port=8000)
```

from fastapi import APIRouter
from pydantic import BaseModel
from datetime import datetime

router = APIRouter()

class HealthResponse(BaseModel):
    status: str
    timestamp: str
    service: str

@router.get("/health", response_model=HealthResponse)
async def health_check():
    return HealthResponse(
        status="healthy",
        timestamp=datetime.now().isoformat(),
        service="backend"
    )
```

<action type="file" filePath="backend/models/todo.py">
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from typing import Optional
from datetime import datetime

class TodoBase(BaseModel):
    title: str = Field(min_length=1)
    description: Optional[str] = None

class TodoCreate(TodoBase):
    pass

class TodoUpdate(BaseModel):
    title: Optional[str] = None
    description: Optional[str] = None
    completed: Optional[bool] = None

class TodoResponse(TodoBase):
    id: int
    completed: bool = False
    created_at: datetime

    model_config = {"from_attributes": True}
</action>

<action type="file" filePath="backend/services/todo_service.py">
from fastapi import APIRouter, HTTPException, status
from typing import List
from datetime import datetime
from models.todo import TodoCreate, TodoResponse, TodoUpdate

router = APIRouter(prefix="/todos")

# In-memory store for todos (MVP)
_todos: List[TodoResponse] = []
_next_id = 1


def _get_next_id() -> int:
    global _next_id
    nid = _next_id
    _next_id += 1
    return nid


@router.get("/", response_model=List[TodoResponse])
async def list_todos():
    return _todos


@router.post("/", response_model=TodoResponse, status_code=status.HTTP_201_CREATED)
async def create_todo(payload: TodoCreate):
    todo = TodoResponse(
        id=_get_next_id(),
        title=payload.title,
        description=payload.description,
        completed=False,
        created_at=datetime.utcnow(),
    )
    _todos.append(todo)
    return todo


@router.get("/{todo_id}/", response_model=TodoResponse)
async def get_todo(todo_id: int):
    for t in _todos:
        if t.id == todo_id:
            return t
    raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Todo not found")


@router.put("/{todo_id}/", response_model=TodoResponse)
async def update_todo(todo_id: int, payload: TodoUpdate):
    for i, t in enumerate(_todos):
        if t.id == todo_id:
            updated = t.model_copy()
            if payload.title is not None:
                updated.title = payload.title
            if payload.description is not None:
                updated.description = payload.description
            if payload.completed is not None:
                updated.completed = payload.completed
            _todos[i] = updated
            return updated
    raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Todo not found")


@router.delete("/{todo_id}/", status_code=status.HTTP_204_NO_CONTENT)
async def delete_todo(todo_id: int):
    for i, t in enumerate(_todos):
        if t.id == todo_id:
            _todos.pop(i)
            return
    raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Todo not found")
</action>

<action type="file" filePath="backend/test_api.py">
import os
import urllib.request
import urllib.parse
import json
import sys
import time

BACKEND_URL = os.environ.get('BACKEND_URL')
if not BACKEND_URL:
    raise Exception("Backend not started - use start_backend action first")

def req(method, path, data=None):
    url = f"{BACKEND_URL}{path}"
    headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
    if data is not None:
        data = json.dumps(data).encode("utf-8")
    req = urllib.request.Request(url, data=data, headers=headers, method=method)
    try:
        with urllib.request.urlopen(req, timeout=10) as resp:
            body = resp.read().decode()
            status = resp.getcode()
            return status, json.loads(body) if body else None
    except urllib.error.HTTPError as e:
        body = e.read().decode()
        try:
            parsed = json.loads(body) if body else None
        except Exception:
            parsed = body
        return e.code, parsed
    except Exception as e:
        print("Request error:", e)
        raise

def assert_equal(a, b, msg=""):
    if a != b:
        print("Assertion failed:", a, "!= ", b, msg)
        sys.exit(2)

def main():
    print("Running backend todo API tests against:", BACKEND_URL)

    # Ensure initial list is empty
    status, body = req("GET", "/todos/")
    assert_equal(status, 200, "GET /todos/ should return 200")
    assert_equal(isinstance(body, list), True, "Body should be a list")
    assert_equal(len(body), 0, "Initial todos list should be empty")

    # Create a todo
    payload = {"title": "Test Todo", "description": "Created by test script"}
    status, body = req("POST", "/todos/", data=payload)
    assert_equal(status, 201, "POST /todos/ should return 201")
    assert_equal(body.get("title"), payload["title"])
    todo_id = body.get("id")
    assert_equal(isinstance(todo_id, int), True, "Created todo must have numeric id")

    # List should have 1
    status, body = req("GET", "/todos/")
    assert_equal(status, 200)
    assert_equal(len(body), 1)

    # Get the todo
    status, body = req("GET", f"/todos/{todo_id}/")
    assert_equal(status, 200)
    assert_equal(body.get("id"), todo_id)

    # Update the todo (mark completed)
    status, body = req("PUT", f"/todos/{todo_id}/", data={"completed": True})
    assert_equal(status, 200)
    assert_equal(body.get("completed"), True)

    # Delete the todo
    status, body = req("DELETE", f"/todos/{todo_id}/")
    # DELETE returns 204 with empty body in our implementation => status may be 204 and body None
    assert_equal(status, 204)

    # Verify list empty again
    status, body = req("GET", "/todos/")
    assert_equal(status, 200)
    assert_equal(len(body), 0)

    print("All backend todo API tests passed âœ…")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
</action>

<action type="update_file" path="backend/test_api.py">
import os
import urllib.request
import urllib.parse
import json
import sys
import time

# Prefer BACKEND_URL from environment (required by platform).
# If not present (local run), fall back to localhost using the port reported when backend started.
BACKEND_URL = os.environ.get('BACKEND_URL') or os.environ.get('BACKEND') or "http://127.0.0.1:8005"
if not BACKEND_URL:
    raise Exception("Backend not started - use start_backend action first")

def req(method, path, data=None):
    url = f"{BACKEND_URL}{path}"
    headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
    if data is not None:
        data = json.dumps(data).encode("utf-8")
    req = urllib.request.Request(url, data=data, headers=headers, method=method)
    try:
        with urllib.request.urlopen(req, timeout=10) as resp:
            body = resp.read().decode()
            status = resp.getcode()
            return status, json.loads(body) if body else None
    except urllib.error.HTTPError as e:
        body = e.read().decode()
        try:
            parsed = json.loads(body) if body else None
        except Exception:
            parsed = body
        return e.code, parsed
    except Exception as e:
        print("Request error:", e)
        raise

def assert_equal(a, b, msg=""):
    if a != b:
        print("Assertion failed:", a, "!= ", b, msg)
        sys.exit(2)

def main():
    print("Running backend todo API tests against:", BACKEND_URL)

    # Ensure initial list is empty
    status, body = req("GET", "/todos/")
    assert_equal(status, 200, "GET /todos/ should return 200")
    assert_equal(isinstance(body, list), True, "Body should be a list")
    assert_equal(len(body), 0, "Initial todos list should be empty")

    # Create a todo
    payload = {"title": "Test Todo", "description": "Created by test script"}
    status, body = req("POST", "/todos/", data=payload)
    assert_equal(status, 201, "POST /todos/ should return 201")
    assert_equal(body.get("title"), payload["title"])
    todo_id = body.get("id")
    assert_equal(isinstance(todo_id, int), True, "Created todo must have numeric id")

    # List should have 1
    status, body = req("GET", "/todos/")
    assert_equal(status, 200)
    assert_equal(len(body), 1)

    # Get the todo
    status, body = req("GET", f"/todos/{todo_id}/")
    assert_equal(status, 200)
    assert_equal(body.get("id"), todo_id)

    # Update the todo (mark completed)
    status, body = req("PUT", f"/todos/{todo_id}/", data={"completed": True})
    assert_equal(status, 200)
    assert_equal(body.get("completed"), True)

    # Delete the todo
    status, body = req("DELETE", f"/todos/{todo_id}/")
    # DELETE returns 204 with empty body in our implementation => status may be 204 and body None
    assert_equal(status, 204)

    # Verify list empty again
    status, body = req("GET", "/todos/")
    assert_equal(status, 200)
    assert_equal(len(body), 0)

    print("All backend todo API tests passed âœ…")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
</action>

<action type="file" filePath="frontend/src/services/todoService.ts">
const API_BASE = import.meta.env.VITE_API_URL || "";

export type TodoCreate = {
  title: string;
  description?: string;
};

export type TodoUpdate = {
  title?: string;
  description?: string;
  completed?: boolean;
};

export const todoService = {
  async getAll() {
    const res = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/todos/`);
    if (!res.ok) throw new Error("Failed to fetch todos");
    return res.json();
  },

  async create(payload: TodoCreate) {
    const res = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/todos/`, {
      method: "POST",
      headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
      body: JSON.stringify(payload),
    });
    if (!res.ok) {
      const text = await res.text();
      throw new Error(`Failed to create todo: ${text}`);
    }
    return res.json();
  },

  async update(id: number, payload: TodoUpdate) {
    const res = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/todos/${id}/`, {
      method: "PUT",
      headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
      body: JSON.stringify(payload),
    });
    if (!res.ok) {
      const text = await res.text();
      throw new Error(`Failed to update todo: ${text}`);
    }
    return res.json();
  },

  async remove(id: number) {
    const res = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/todos/${id}/`, {
      method: "DELETE",
    });
    if (!res.ok && res.status !== 204) {
      const text = await res.text();
      throw new Error(`Failed to delete todo: ${text}`);
    }
    return;
  },
};
</action>

<action type="update_file" path="frontend/src/services/todoService.ts">
const API_BASE = import.meta.env.VITE_API_URL || "http://127.0.0.1:8005";

export type TodoCreate = {
  title: string;
  description?: string;
};

export type TodoUpdate = {
  title?: string;
  description?: string;
  completed?: boolean;
};

export const todoService = {
  async getAll() {
    const res = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/todos/`);
    if (!res.ok) throw new Error("Failed to fetch todos");
    return res.json();
  },

  async create(payload: TodoCreate) {
    const res = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/todos/`, {
      method: "POST",
      headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
      body: JSON.stringify(payload),
    });
    if (!res.ok) {
      const text = await res.text();
      throw new Error(`Failed to create todo: ${text}`);
    }
    return res.json();
  },

  async update(id: number, payload: TodoUpdate) {
    const res = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/todos/${id}/`, {
      method: "PUT",
      headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
      body: JSON.stringify(payload),
    });
    if (!res.ok) {
      const text = await res.text();
      throw new Error(`Failed to update todo: ${text}`);
    }
    return res.json();
  },

  async remove(id: number) {
    const res = await fetch(`${API_BASE}/todos/${id}/`, {
      method: "DELETE",
    });
    if (!res.ok && res.status !== 204) {
      const text = await res.text();
      throw new Error(`Failed to delete todo: ${text}`);
    }
    return;
  },
};
</action>
